southampton-open-contest-entertainment-section
None
O2 Guildhall Southampton, Southampton, Hampshire, England, UK A musical selection of own choice of no more than 15 minutes duration - this section is an Entertainment Contest and will be judged in 'open adjudication' - bands will be judged on presentation as well as musical ability. Special prize of Â£50 for most entertaining presentation was awarded to Bournemouth Concert Brass.
